objects.description: {{LinkById|G0018}} actors used the following commands after exploiting a machine with {{LinkById|S0042}} malware to obtain information about the OS: ver >> %temp%\download systeminfo >> %temp%\download

external_references.description: FireEye Threat Intelligence. (2015, December 1). China-based Cyber Threat Group Uses Dropbox for Malware Communications and Targets Hong Kong Media Outlets. Retrieved December 4, 2015.
